Election Information
====================

* [Home](https://www.shavanoparktx.gov/)
* [Departments](https://www.shavanoparktx.gov/departments/index.php)
* [City Secretary / HR Director](https://www.shavanoparktx.gov/departments/city_secretary.php)
* Elections


Whether you have moved from a neighboring city or from another state, you must be a registered voter in order to vote in the City of Shavano Park. Register to Vote by visiting [VoteTexas.gov](https://www.votetexas.gov/)  
  
There are three precincts within the City of Shavano Park - Precinct 3075, 3176, and 3196.   
  
**Municipal Elections/Elecciones Municipales**The City of Shavano Park City Council election is held on the first Saturday in May of each year.   
This year election day is **May 2, 2026** for the City of Shavano Park, Texas.  
  
The **May 2, 2026** General Election in the City of Shavano Park, Texas is for the purpose of electing **three (3) Aldermen.**  
Una Elección General en la Ciudad de Shavano Park, Texas con el propósito de elegir tres Concejales**.**  

Shavano Park Early Election and Election Day Vote Center Location:   
Shavano Park City Hall [900 Saddletree Court](https://maps.app.goo.gl/HDx1yTd3qW2Y3xN8A), Shavano Park, Texas 78231   
  
For more information about the City's election, visit [LINK](https://www.shavanoparktx.gov/departments/elections_elecciones.php).

Document Center
---------------

The Document Center provides easy access to public documents. Click on one of the categories below to see related documents or use the search function.

Search for file name:
---------------------




Categories always sorted by seq (sub-categories sorted within each category)
  
Documents sorted by \_RECORDID in Ascending Order within category

RESET
